sourcesContent: import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { InspectionApiService } from 'src/app/inspection-api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-edit-inspection', templateUrl: './add-edit-inspection.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-edit-inspection.component.css'] }) export class AddEditInspectionComponent implements OnInit { inspectionList$!: constructor(private service:InspectionApiService) { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
